GaugeText.FontColor: %((A:Turb eng1 N1, percent) abs 100.1 > if{ 'red' } els{ 0x01E00D )
%((A:Turb eng2 N1, percent) abs 100.1 > if{ 'red' } els{ 0x01E00D )
%((A:General eng1 exhaust gas temperature, celsius) abs 1000 > if{ 'red' } els{ 0x01E00D )
%((A:General eng2 exhaust gas temperature, celsius) abs 1000 > if{ 'red' } els{ 0x01E00D )

Element.Visibility: (L:thr1detent,enum) 0 == (L:thr1detent,enum) 0 == (A:Turb eng1 N1, percent) 0.1 > && (L:thr2detent,enum) 0 == && (A:Turb eng2 N1, percent) 0.1 > &&

GaugeText.GaugeString: %((A:Turb eng1 fuel flow pph, pounds per hour) 0.4536 *)%!5d!
%((A:Turb eng2 fuel flow pph, pounds per hour) 0.4536 *)%!5d!
%((A:Fuel left quantity, gallons) (A:Fuel tank center quantity, gallons) + (A:Fuel right quantity, gallons) + (A:Fuel weight per gallon, pounds) * 0.4536 * )%!5d!
